metadata.title: CVE-2020-23906 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: FFmpeg N-98388-g76a3ee996b allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via a crafted audio file due to insufficient verification of data authenticity.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
